SELECT i.id as productId, i.item_name as productName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
